div.div: Seasonal variation in greenfinch occurrence in gardens.
div.p: (a) Reporting rate for greenfinch in all GBW gardens for the years 1996â€“2005 (grey lines), 2006 (red) and 2007 (blue). (b) Fitted seasonal pattern of mean peak greenfinch count in 828 GBW gardens with complete counts in 2005. (c) Difference in mean peak count throughout the year between 2005 and 2006 for greenfinch, dashed lines represent 95% confidence limits.
